Articles.Content:
Based on the Saab AJS-37 Viggen with some freedom, here is the Vigger

Main features:

  • Afterburning turbojet with thurst reverser
  • Supercruise (Needs afterburner to get past 400m/s, but after that you can fly dry and still gain speed in a level flight around 6000m)
  • Canard delta configuration with flaps
  • Tandem main wheels for strength and authenticity
  • Good maneuverability

Action groups:

  • 1 - Afterburner
  • 2 - Turst reverser
  • 3 - Flaps (Make sure they are deploying downwards before flying as seen on the screenshot. They also act as airbrakes.)

DOWNLOAD

Edited January 28, 2017 by Angezerus
